text: Sher Bahadur Deuba (; born 13 June 1946) is a Nepalese politician. He became the 32nd Prime Minister of Nepal in 2021. He first became a Member of Parliament in 1991. In 2006, he became the president of the Nepali Congress. == References == Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Nepali Congress politicians Category:Prime ministers of Nepal
title: Sher Bahadur Deuba
